description:
The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain`s place. While they`re busy beating each other`s brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omachikane! Aa Fukkatsu no Buggy Senchou!
The Wait Is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!
Vous l`attendiez depuis longtemps... le capitaine Baggy est de retour !
مطاردة قبّعة القّشّ! مغامرة باغي الصّغير الكبيرة
คุณกำลังรอมันอยู่! การกลับมาของบากี้!
お待ちかね! あぁ復活のバギー船長!
